channel.title: Need Help With 4 Things!
channel.description:
Q1 : When i cut the tree i get heaps of cash how do i make it i cant get any cash wen ppl cut tree?
Q2 : Also when i steal from the teastall i get money to how do i get rid of that ?
Q3 : I cant trade the general store keeper either ?! plz help!
Q4 : How do i make a command so u can only do it once liek a starter command?

item.title: Need Help With 4 Things!
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“Owza, post:1, topic:100006”]Q1 : When i cut the tree i get heaps of cash how do i make it i cant get any cash wen ppl cut tree?

Q2 : Also when i steal from the teastall i get money to how do i get rid of that ?

Q3 : I cant trade the general store keeper either ?! plz help!

Q4 : How do i make a command so u can only do it once liek a starter command?[/quote]

Q1: When I cut the tree I get heaps of cash. How do I make it I can’t get any cash when people cut the tree?

Answer: Search for (in client.java) -

case TREE ID:

Replace “TREE ID” with the tree ID number and search for that case. You should see something like

addItem(995, A NUMBER);

It means that when you cut the tree, you get the item ID 995 - money -. The number after it is the quantity. So delete that line, so you won’t get anymore cash when you cut the tree.

Q2: Also when I steal from the teastall i get money. How do I get rid of that?

Answer: Same as above ^. Search for the teastall case. Repeat the steps.

Q3: I can’t trade the general store keeper either?! Please help!

Answer: You have to understand JAVA. It’s not like when you create the visual part of a game, everything else is functioning how you like it. You have to code it. Search in client.java for “wanneshop”, and also look at how shops.cfg is done. That’s all I can tell you, I can’t be bothered to give you a whole tutorial on it.

Q4: How do I make a command so you can only do it once like a starter command?

Answer: Search for your starter command, and look at how it is structured.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With 4 Things!
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

A1 : Open Client.Java
Than Find public boolean WC
Look Down Into The Boolean And You Should See if(!addItem(995, amount)) {
Change The 995 To The Item ID# You Want The Tree To Give
Than Change The Amount To The Number On How Much You Want Per Cut

A2 : ( Well I Don’t Really Know If This Is Correct )
Find /*THEIVING*/

Look Down Untill You See addItem(item, itemAmount);
Change The item To The Item ID You Want The Stall Giving
Then Change The itemAmount To The Number On How Much You Want The Stall To Give

A4 : Make A .txt File Called ‘blackmarks.txt’ Without The '.

Then Open Client.Java And Add These Commands [code]if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a n00bie who just got themself a black mark");
//
BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}
//
}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit");
addItem(995,2000000);
addItem(1039, 5);

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“scheck”));
{
sendMessage(“You now have “+kitstarter+” starter packs”);
}
} [/code]

Then Find Public Boolean Process

ABOVE IT Put public int kitstarter = 0;

Then Find } else if (token.equals("character-lastlogintime")) { lastlogintime = Integer.parseInt(token2);
UNDER IT Add } else if (token.equals("character-kitstarter")) { kitstarter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Then Find characterfile.write("character-ancients = ", 0, 21);

ABOVE IT Add characterfile.write("character-kitstarter = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kitstarter), 0, Integer.toString(kitstarter).length()); characterfile.newLine();
